title: OXO Lite: Tic Tac Toe Extreme
creator: Handmark

extendedInfo.description: OXO is similar to the Tic Tac Toe game you loved as a child, but a bit more challenging and now available wherever you go with the mobile app.If youâre a fan of challenging casual puzzle games such as sudoku, crossword puzzles, jumble, dots â OXO is the game for you!Donât be fooled by its simplicity, OXO requires quick strategy to win-make sure you donât leave an opportunity for your opponent to get the âOXOâ before you!  The goal is to fill the board, beating your opponent in the most âO-X-Oâ wins- right to left, up, down, across- keeps you on your âtoesâ!  Also, play the game with a friend in turn-by-turn game mode.An ads-free version is available if you upgrade to OXOFollow @Handmark on Twitter for updates or visit www.handmark.com/games/oxo

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Unlike reg. Tic tac toe this is challemging as there is no clear cut way to win. That said it\'s alot of fun!!!!

reviews.title: Cheating....
reviews.comment: When the computer gets an oxo it automatically receives 2pts. When player 1 gets oxo that player receives 1pt. By giving the computer extra pts it makes it hard to beat... That needs to be fixed asap!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Game isnt fair. For every oxo the game gets two points to my one and two turns to my one
